verses.roman:
sei dui-skandhe bahu śākhā upajila
tāra upaśākhā-gaṇe jagat chāila

synonyms: sei—that; dui-skandhe—in two trunks; bahu—many; śākhā—branches; upajila—grew; tāra—of them; upaśākhā-gaṇe—subbranches; jagat—the whole world; chāila—covered.
translation: From these two trunks grew many branches and subbranches that covered the entire world.
